demos.title: Fields & Values
demos.teaches: Create form fields with form() and FormField. Read values with .value() and update them imperatively with .value.set().

demos.title: Field State & Events
demos.teaches: React to field-level state signals like touched, dirty, and errors. Use these signals in the template for dynamic UI feedback.

demos.title: Form Submission
demos.teaches: Use submit() to mark all fields as touched and only invoke the callback when the form is valid. Ideal pattern for login forms.

demos.title: Nested Objects
demos.teaches: Bind nested model objects like address with sub-properties (street, city, postalCode). Access nested fields via dot notation in the schema.

demos.title: Form Arrays
demos.teaches: Work with arrays of objects using applyEach to validate each item. Add and remove items dynamically from the form array.

demos.title: Validation Basics
demos.teaches: Learn built-in validators (required, minLength, email) and introduce cross-field validation with validate() and valueOf(). Implement password confirmation matching.

demos.title: Model & Custom Rules
demos.teaches: Build forms with custom validation rules using validate() and regex patterns. Observe reactive model updates pushed via setTimeout.

demos.title: Arrays with Schema
demos.teaches: Validate arrays of nested objects using reusable schema() definitions. Combine with conditional validation using the when option on required.

demos.title: Nullable Fields
demos.teaches: Handle nullable and NaN model properties (string | null, number | null). Use applyWhenValue() to validate only when a value is non-null.

demos.title: Async Validators
demos.teaches: Combine sync validators with async validation using validateAsync() and rxResource for server-side uniqueness checks.

demos.title: Cross-Field Rules
demos.teaches: Write custom cross-field validation using validate() with ctx.valueOf() to read sibling fields. Enforce rules like 'provide email or phone'.

demos.title: Conditional Validators
demos.teaches: Activate validators conditionally using the when option on required() and applyWhen(). Validators toggle based on other field values.

demos.title: Error Display
demos.teaches: Aggregate and display errors across multiple fields using computed() over field.errors(). Combine minLength, maxLength, and custom validators.

demos.title: ErrorStateMatcher
demos.teaches: Customize when errors appear using ErrorStateMatcher with traditional Reactive Forms. Demonstrates cross-field password validation with updateOn blur.

demos.title: Conditional Fields
demos.teaches: Control field visibility and interactivity with hidden(), disabled(), and readonly(). Toggle field states based on other field values.

demos.title: Cascading Dropdowns
demos.teaches: Build dependent dropdown controls where selecting a category filters the available values in a second dropdown. Uses form arrays with applyEach.

demos.title: Pets CRUD
demos.teaches: Complete CRUD workflow: list, select, edit, and create pets from a service. Tracks model changes via effect() into a change log.
